appleIPSTooltip: Enabling Apple IPS allows the user to utilize the Apple IPS deployment in the facility.
browseServiceHeading: Choose an indoor positioning data service
gnssTooltip: Enabling GNSS allows the user to obtain an outdoor position upon exiting the building.
pathSnappingTooltip: If Path Snapping is enabled, ArcGIS IPS snaps the user's location indicator to Pathways line features that are IPS aware.
smoothingTooltip: The Smoothing feature enhances turn-by-turn navigation by addressing abrupt changes in direction, speed, and position.
